statements: UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET sets = 5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET reps = 12, weight = 50.5 WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET exercise_name = 'Squats', weight = 60.0 WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET sets = 5, reps = 12 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET weight = 50.5 WHERE exercise_name = 'Squats';
UPDATE WorkoutRoutine SET date = '2023-01-15' WHERE sets > 3 AND reps > 10;
UPDATE workout_routines SET workout_duration_minutes = 60 WHERE routine_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_progress SET calories_burned = 300 WHERE progress_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_routines SET routine_name = 'Morning Workout' WHERE routine_id = 2;
UPDATE workout_routines SET workout_duration_minutes = workout_duration_minutes + 10 WHERE routine_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_progress SET calories_burned = 300 WHERE routine_id = 2 AND progress_date = '2023-01-15';
UPDATE workout_routines SET routine_name = 'Full Body Workout' WHERE routine_id = 3;
UPDATE daily_workouts SET workout_duration = 60 WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_progress SET progress_weight = 75.5 WHERE progress_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_stats SET total_sets = 5, total_reps = 10 WHERE stats_id = 1;
UPDATE daily_workouts SET workout_type = 'Weightlifting', workout_duration = 60 WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE workout_progress SET progress_notes = 'Focused on leg exercises' WHERE progress_id = 5;
UPDATE workout_stats SET total_sets = 4, total_reps = 12, avg_weight_lifted = 25.5 WHERE workout_id = 3;
UPDATE workout SET workout_name = 'Cardio' WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE exercise SET exercise_category = 'Legs' WHERE exercise_id = 1;
UPDATE progress SET weight = 50.5 WHERE progress_id = 1;
UPDATE workout SET workout_name = 'Leg Day', workout_duration = 90 WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE exercise SET exercise_category = 'Strength Training' WHERE exercise_id = 2;
UPDATE progress SET weight = 50.5, notes = 'Focus on form' WHERE progress_id = 3;
UPDATE workouts SET sets = 4, reps = 12, weight = 50 WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE exercise_logs SET sets_completed = 5, reps_completed = 15, weight_used = 60 WHERE log_id = 1;
UPDATE progress_tracking SET weight = 75, body_fat = 15 WHERE tracking_id = 1;
UPDATE workouts SET sets = sets + 1 WHERE workout_id = 1;
UPDATE exercise_logs SET sets_completed = sets_completed + 2, reps_completed = reps_completed + 5 WHERE log_id = 3;
UPDATE progress_tracking SET weight = weight * 0.95, body_fat = body_fat - 1.5 WHERE tracking_id = 5;
